content:
fitzgen opened issue #3532:

See this thread: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3506#discussion_r742432255

If we don't end up ever using it in our isel code, then lets remove the feature. If we do end up finding we need it, then lets redesign the syntax.
